note: This is an otherwise ordinary Observation except for a few extra bits of information. In addition to a meaningful public term for the code, we can also provide the code associated with the variable in which the data was found. More importantly, we can directly link the observation back to the ObservationDefinition if the focus isn't otherwise needed.
